description: For the most part, I modified the tab so it looks more realistic, as if someone were to actually play these licks, such as removing some palm-muted notes. Removed useless rests, made drum tab readable, and changed Guitar A to distortion as it's more appropriate. Some people also get confused with the 30th fret (such a thing does exist, by the way) on the guitar, so I added "pickslide" above these instances.
title: Punk-O-Matic Theme
